member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC
member.summary: Describes a shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.Version
member.summary: Shader version.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.Creator
member.summary: The name of the originator of the shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.Flags
member.summary: Shader compilation/parse flags.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.ConstantBuffers
member.summary: The number of shader-constant buffers.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.BoundResources
member.summary: The number of resource (textures and buffers) bound to a shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.InputParameters
member.summary: The number of parameters in the input signature.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.OutputParameters
member.summary: The number of parameters in the output signature.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.InstructionCount
member.summary: The number of intermediate-language instructions in the compiled shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TempRegisterCount
member.summary: The number of temporary registers in the compiled shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TempArrayCount
member.summary: Number of temporary arrays used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.DefCount
member.summary: Number of constant defines.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.DclCount
member.summary: Number of declarations (input + output).

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TextureNormalInstructions
member.summary: Number of non-categorized texture instructions.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TextureLoadInstructions
member.summary: Number of texture load instructions

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TextureCompInstructions
member.summary: Number of texture comparison instructions

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TextureBiasInstructions
member.summary: Number of texture bias instructions

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TextureGradientInstructions
member.summary: Number of texture gradient instructions.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.FloatInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of floating point arithmetic instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.IntInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of signed integer arithmetic instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.UintInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of unsigned integer arithmetic instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.StaticFlowControlCount
member.summary: Number of static flow control instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.DynamicFlowControlCount
member.summary: Number of dynamic flow control instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.MacroInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of macro instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.ArrayInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of array instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.CutInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of cut instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.EmitInstructionCount
member.summary: Number of emit instructions used.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.GSOutputTopology
member.summary: The -typed value that represents the geometry shader output topology.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.GSMaxOutputVertexCount
member.summary: Geometry shader maximum output vertex count.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.InputPrimitive
member.summary: The -typed value that represents the input primitive for a geometry shader or hull shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.PatchConstantParameters
member.summary: Number of parameters in the patch-constant signature.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.cGSInstanceCount
member.summary: Number of geometry shader instances.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.cControlPoints
member.summary: Number of control points in the hull shader and domain shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.HSOutputPrimitive
member.summary: The -typed value that represents the tessellator output-primitive type.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.HSPartitioning
member.summary: The -typed value that represents the tessellator partitioning mode.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.TessellatorDomain
member.summary: The -typed value that represents the tessellator domain.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.cBarrierInstructions
member.summary: Number of barrier instructions in a compute shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.cInterlockedInstructions
member.summary: Number of interlocked instructions in a compute shader.

member.name: D3D11_SHADER_DESC.cTextureStoreInstructions
member.summary: Number of texture writes in a compute shader.
